desc: Complete HUGO Gene Nomenclature Committee (HGNC) dataset. The HGNC is responsible for approving unique symbols and names for human loci, including protein coding genes, ncRNA genes and pseudogenes, to allow unambiguous scientific communication. For each known human gene we approve a gene name and symbol (short-form abbreviation). All approved symbols are stored in the HGNC database, www.genenames.org, a curated online repository of HGNC-approved gene nomenclature, gene groups and associated resources including links to genomic, proteomic and phenotypic information. Each symbol is unique and we ensure that each gene is only given one approved gene symbol. It is necessary to provide a unique symbol for each gene so that we and others can talk about them, and this also facilitates electronic data retrieval from publications and databases. In preference each symbol maintains parallel construction in different members of a gene family and can also be used in other species, especially the mouse.

fields.name: hgnc_id
fields.desc: A unique ID created by the HGNC for every approved symbol.

fields.name: symbol
fields.desc: The HGNC approved gene symbol. Equates to the 'Approved symbol' field within the gene symbol report.

fields.name: name
fields.desc: HGNC approved name for the gene. Equates to the 'Approved name' field within the gene symbol report.

fields.name: locus_group
fields.desc: A group name for a set of related locus types as defined by the HGNC (e.g. non-coding RNA).

fields.name: locus_type
fields.desc: The locus type as set by the HGNC.

fields.name: status
fields.desc: Status of the symbol report, which can be either 'Approved' or 'Entry Withdrawn'.

fields.name: location
fields.desc: Cytogenetic location of the gene (e.g. 2q34).

fields.name: location_sortable
fields.desc: Same as 'location' but single digit chromosomes are prefixed with a 0 enabling them to be sorted in correct numerical order (e.g. 02q34).

fields.name: alias_symbol
fields.desc: Other symbols used to refer to this gene as seen in the 'Alias symbols' field in the gene symbol report..

fields.name: alias_name
fields.desc: Other names used to refer to this gene as seen in the 'Alias names' field in the gene symbol report.

fields.name: prev_symbol
fields.desc: Gene symbols previously approved by the HGNC for this gene. Equates to the 'Previous symbols' field within the gene symbol report.

fields.name: prev_name
fields.desc: Gene names previously approved by the HGNC for this gene. Equates to the 'Previous names' field within the gene symbol report.

fields.name: gene_group
fields.desc: The gene group name as set by the HGNC and seen at the top of the gene group reports.

fields.name: gene_group_id
fields.desc: ID used to designate a gene group the gene has been assigned to.

fields.name: date_approved_reserved
fields.desc: The date the entry was first approved.

fields.name: date_symbol_changed
fields.desc: The date the approved symbol was last changed.

fields.name: date_name_changed
fields.desc: The date the approved name was last changed.

fields.name: date_modified
fields.desc: Date the entry was last modified.

fields.name: entrez_id
fields.desc: NCBI gene ID. Found within the 'Gene resources' section of the gene symbol report.

fields.name: ensembl_gene_id
fields.desc: Ensembl gene ID. Found within the 'Gene resources' section of the gene symbol report.

fields.name: vega_id
fields.desc: Vega gene ID. Found within the 'Gene resources' section of the gene symbol report.

fields.name: ucsc_id
fields.desc: UCSC gene ID. Found within the 'Gene resources' section of the gene symbol report.

fields.name: ena
fields.desc: International Nucleotide Sequence Database Collaboration (GenBank, ENA and DDBJ) accession number(s). Found within the 'Nucleotide resources' section of the gene symbol report.

fields.name: refseq_accession
fields.desc: RefSeq nucleotide accession(s). Found within the 'Nucleotide resources' section of the gene symbol report.

fields.name: ccds_id
fields.desc: Consensus CDS ID. Found within the 'Nucleotide resources' section of the gene symbol report.

fields.name: uniprot_ids
fields.desc: UniProt protein accession. Found within the 'Protein resource' section of the gene symbol report.

fields.name: pubmed_id
fields.desc: Pubmed and Europe Pubmed Central PMID(s).

fields.name: mgd_id
fields.desc: Mouse genome informatics database ID. Found within the 'Homologs' section of the gene symbol report.

fields.name: rgd_id
fields.desc: Rat genome database gene ID. Found within the 'Homologs' section of the gene symbol report.

fields.name: lsdb
fields.desc: The name of the Locus Specific Mutation Database and URL for the gene separated by a | character, e.g. Mutations of the ATP-binding Cassette Transporter Retina|http://www.retina-international.org/files/sci-news/abcrmut.htm.

fields.name: cosmic
fields.desc: Symbol used within the Catalogue of somatic mutations in cancer for the gene. (No longer updated!)

fields.name: omim_id
fields.desc: Online Mendelian Inheritance in Man (OMIM) ID http://www.omim.org/entry/

fields.name: mirbase
fields.desc: miRBase ID http://www.mirbase.org/cgi-bin/mirna_entry.pl?acc=

fields.name: homeodb
fields.desc: Homeobox Database ID http://homeodb.cbi.pku.edu.cn/gene_info.get?id=

fields.name: snornabase
fields.desc: snoRNABase ID https://www-snorna.biotoul.fr//plus.php?snoid=

fields.name: bioparadigms_slc
fields.desc: Symbol used to link to the SLC tables database at bioparadigms.org for the gene http://slc.bioparadigms.org/protein?GeneName=

fields.name: orphanet
fields.desc: Orphanet ID http://www.orpha.net/consor/cgi-bin/OC_Exp.php?Lng=GB&Expert=

fields.name: pseudogene.org
fields.desc: Pseudogene.org ID http://tables.pseudogene.org/

fields.name: horde_id
fields.desc: Symbol used within HORDE for the gene http://genome.weizmann.ac.il/horde/card/index/symbol:

fields.name: merops
fields.desc: ID used to link to the MEROPS peptidase database http://merops.sanger.ac.uk/cgi-bin/pepsum?mid=

fields.name: imgt
fields.desc: Symbol used within international ImMunoGeneTics information system http://www.imgt.org/IMGT_GENE-DB/GENElect?query=2+<SYMBOL>&species=Homo+sapiens.

fields.name: iuphar
fields.desc: The objectId used to link to the IUPHAR/BPS Guide to PHARMACOLOGY database. To link to IUPHAR/BPS Guide to PHARMACOLOGY database only use the number (only use 1 from the result objectId:1) in the example URL http://www.guidetopharmacology.org/GRAC/ObjectDisplayForward?objectId=

fields.name: kznf_gene_catalog
fields.desc: ID used to link to the Human KZNF Gene Catalog http://znf.igb.uiuc.edu/human/action/exploreView?type=locus&id=

fields.name: mamit-trnadb
fields.desc: ID to link to the Mamit-tRNA database http://mamit-trna.u-strasbg.fr/mutations.asp?idAA=

fields.name: cd
fields.desc: Symbol used within the Human Cell Differentiation Molecule database for the gene http://www.hcdm.org/index.php?option=com_molecule&cdnumber=

fields.name: lncrnadb
fields.desc: lncRNA Database ID http://www.lncrnadb.org/

fields.name: enzyme_id
fields.desc: ENZYME EC accession number. http://enzyme.expasy.org/EC/<EC ACCESSION NUMBER>

fields.name: intermediate_filament_db
fields.desc: ID used to link to the Human Intermediate Filament Database http://www.interfil.org/details.php?id=
